activities:
Personal information from our clients' employees is gathered only after the client's organization has agreed to the user license (aka contractor agreement).  

We use this client information to inform and communicate with the individual about their account and the services that they have requested from us.  We email, call, fax individuals on a regular basis with updates or reports.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
